subject: Order #SSN5633
description_text:
Hello,

In site, the order is unfulfilled, i did the payment and i didn't receive
any further information about my order yet!

Regards,
Bruno Pereira

conversations.body_text: Hi Bruno,    Please provide the recipient’s information, order amount, order date, and destination country. Once the payment is successfully completed, we will ship orders in sequence according to the order timeline.

Hi,

Attached are two screenshots with the corresponding request.

Regards, Bruno.

Hi Bruno,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to handle the pending matters and will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
Hi Bruno,    We apologize for not updating you promptly about your shipment. Your package has been shipped.  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510404026932/trackdetails
